Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at B&B Hotel Verona in Verona (Fiera Verona), you'll be close to Policlinico Giambattista Rossi Hospital and Arena di Verona. This hotel is within close proximity of Fiera di Verona and Verona Uno.

Rooms
Stay in one of 76 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of B&B Hotel Verona, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
You can find a meal at a coffee shop/café serving guests of B&B Hotel Verona, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Policlinico Giambattista Rossi Hospital - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Fiera di Verona - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Verona Uno - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Porta Nuova - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Juliet's Tomb - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Teatro Ristori - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi
Castelvecchio - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Castelvecchio Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Gavi Arch - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Arena di Verona - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Verona City Hall - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Verona Philharmonic Theatre - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Piazza Bra - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Basilica of San Zeno Maggiore - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi

The preferred airport for B&B Hotel Verona is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 4.8 km / 3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Sud Point is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 4.8 km / 3 mi.
